galleryinfo.HB: Cassia javanica ssp. agnes, (de Wit) K. Larsen

cardinfo.CI: Cassia - Pink Cassia Tree/Pink Cassia Tree - Canopy.jpg

V: Native to SE Asia, Pink shower tree is a showy ornamental tree. Pink flowers, which resemble the yellow flowers of the Indian Laburnum, appear as if the long branches were wrapped in them, attracting bees and butterflies. Requires regular irrigation. Wind resistant, since branches are very flexible. Perfect choice for small yards and patios, nice container plant.
Color: dark brown; Becomes darker, rougher in older trees

cardinfo.CI: Cassia - Pink Cassia Tree/Pink Cassia Tree - Bark.jpg

V: Clusters in long slender stalks, 5 brick red petals fading to white. 10 stamens with round swellings on the filaments.

cardinfo.CI: Cassia - Pink Cassia Tree/Pink Cassia Tree - Flower.jpg
Cassia - Pink Cassia Tree/Pink Cassia Tree - Fruit.jpg

V: Velvety leaflets, unequal at base, notched or blunt, with a minute point at apex.

cardinfo.CI: Cassia - Pink Cassia Tree/Pink Cassia Tree - Leaf.jpg
